name: CocoaPlanet Chocolates - Mandarin Orange, Box of 10
intro: A fresh blend of exotic citrus married with bittersweet chocolate in the French tradition – a rich and romantic contrast for the palate.  Organic Mandarin Orange, Tangerine and Citrus Blossom with Organic Orange Zest suspended in Premium Dark Chocolate (64% Cacao).  96 Calories, 9g Net Carbs, 7g Sugar, All Natural.
ingredients: http://www.cocoaplanet.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/images/nfcm.png

name: CocoaPlanet Chocolates - Salted Caramel, Box of 10
intro: Pearls of rich caramel enhanced with Pacific sea salt create a smooth and sophisticated experience.  Salted Caramel with Tahitian & Madagascar Vanilla and Pacific Sea Salt suspended in Premium Dark Chocolate (64% Cacao).  99 Calories, 8g Net Carbs, 7g Sugar, All Natural.
ingredients: http://www.cocoaplanet.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/images/nfcs.png

name: CocoaPlanet Chocolates - Vanilla Espresso, Box of 10
intro: Exotic vanilla beans matched with smoky espresso give a nod to the elevation of coffee tastes and rise of designer espresso bars and cafes in America.  Tahitian and Madagascar Vanilla Bean and Espresso Super Fine Grind suspended in Premium Dark Chocolate (64% Cacao).  89 Calories, 8g Net Carbs, 7g Sugar, All Natural.
ingredients: http://www.cocoaplanet.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/images/nfve.png

name: CocoaPlanet Chocolates - CocoaMint, Box of 10
intro: Cool organic peppermint is balanced perfectly with rich dark chocolate – a sparkle that is intense but not overwhelming.  Organic Peppermint with finely ground Organic Peppermint Drops suspended in Premium Dark Chocolate (64% Cacao).  96 Calories, 9g Net Carbs, 7g Sugar, All Natural.
ingredients: http://www.cocoaplanet.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/images/nfcm.png

name: CocoaPlanet Chocolates - Deep Dark Truffle, Box of 10
intro: Arbequina olive oil and 3 premium dark chocolates give this ganache truffle a silky texture and adventurous taste – an ideal match for robust red or sparkling white wine.  Madagascar Criollo Chocolate (65% Cacao), 72% Cacao Dark Chocolate, Arbequina Olive Oil and Pacific Sea Salt suspended in Premium Dark Chocolate (64% Cacao).  98 Calories, 7g Net Carbs, 7g Sugar, All Natural.
ingredients: http://www.cocoaplanet.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/images/nfco.png

name: CocoaPlanet Five Flavor Cube, Set of 2
intro: CocoaPlanet's Five Flavor Cube contains one of each flavor: Salted Caramel, Vanilla Espresso, Deep Dark Truffle, Mandarin Orange and CocoaMint.  Attractively packaged in a clear 3-inch cube, it makes a terrific gift for any occasion.

name: Calivirgin Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil - 500ML
intro: A unique unfiltered blend of estate grown, Arbequina and Koroneiki olives is cold-pressed within hours of harvest, which produces a fresh, aromatic, fruity flavor that is perfect for dipping but mild enough to use as a trans fat free culinary staple in your kitchen. COOC Certified Extra Virgin Olive Oil

name: Calivirgin Frantoio Miller's Reserve Extra Virgin Olive Oil - 250ML
intro: Frantoio olive oil is one of the most highly acclaimed olive oil varieties in the world, especially in the Tuscan regions of Italy. This olive oil has a wonderful aroma with fruity notes and a hint of green apple ending with a slightly strong aftertaste. These Frantoio Olives were handpicked from local trees in Lodi, California and processed using state of the art cold extraction technology creating a first pressed, California olive oil remarkable enough to be labeled under our Miller's Reserve label. COOC Seal Certified Extra Virgin Olive Oil

name: Calivirgin Bountiful Basil Olive Oil - 250ML
intro: Calivirgin Bountiful Basil olive oil is milled exactly the same way as our premium extra virgin olive oil, except basil leaves are crushed together with the olives. The result is a fresh, unfiltered, premium olive oil with no additives or preservatives that has a natural basil flavor. Try this California olive oil on tomatoes and fresh mozzarella with Calivinegar Barrel- Aged Balsamic for a great caprese salad or on pasta or baked potatoes with fresh grated Parmesan. Delicioso!

name: Calivirgin Buddha's Hand Citron Olive Oil - 250ML
intro: Calivirgin Buddha’s Hand Citron olive oil is milled exactly the same way as our premium extra virgin olive oil, except fresh Buddha’s Hand Citron was crushed together with the olives. The result is a fresh, unﬁltered, premium oil with no additives or preservatives with a natural citron ﬂavor. Some believe this “ﬁngered citron” will bestow good fortune on a household. Some believe it came to symbolize happiness, wealth and longevity. At Calivirgin we believe we have taken this strange looking “golden fruit” and made a tasty California olive oil out of it! Drizzle over pasta, ﬁsh and salads or use as a citron ﬂavored healthy alternative to butter in your baking. Perfetto!

name: Calivirgin Extreme Heat Jalapeno Olive Oil - 250 ML
intro: We have had some customers tell us that our Hot Virgin Jalapeño Olive Oil is not HOT enough so this year we milled twice the amount of fresh jalapeño peppers with the olives to create this Extreme Heat Jalapeño Olive Oil. This gives any dish an extra burst of flavor with a fiery jalapeño burn that is incredibly addicting! If you love spicy then you will want to put this on everything. Warning - Enjoy with Caution. Molto Piccante!

name: Calivirgin Guilty Garlic Olive Oil - 250ML
intro: Calivirgin Guilty Garlic olive oil is milled exactly the same way as our premium extra virgin olive oil, except fresh garlic cloves are crushed together with the olives. the result is a fresh, unfiltered, premium olive oil with no additives or preservatives that has a natural garlic flavor. That garlic press may collect dust in your drawer after you discover how easily this California olive oil adds flavor to your cooking. Fantastico!

name: Calivirgin Hot Virgin Jalapeno Olive Oil - 250 ML
intro: Calivirgin Hot Virgin Jalapeño olive oil is milled exactly the same way as our premium extra virgin olive oil, except jalapeños are crushed together with the olives. The result is a fresh, unfiltered, premium , California olive oil with no additives or preservatives that has a natural jalapeño flavor. Try it on eggs or with your favorite pasta recipe or marinade for a delicious and unique taste. Eccellente!

name: Calivirgin Jalapeno Garlic Olive Oil - 250 ML
intro: Calivirgin Jalapeño Garlic olive oil is milled exactly the same way as our premium extra virgin olive oil, except fresh jalapeños and garlic cloves are crushed together with the olives. The result is a fresh unﬁltered, premium California olive oil with no additives or preservatives that has a natural jalapeño and garlic ﬂavor. At ﬁrst you will taste the savory garlic, then the ﬁery jalapeño will sneak up on you with a burn that keeps you eating more. This one is not for the faint of heart! Piccante!

name: Calivirgin Lusty Lemon Olive Oil - 250ML
intro: Calivirgin Lusty Lemon olive oil is milled exactly the same way as our premium extra virgin olive oil, except lemons are crushed together with the olives. The result is a fresh, unfiltered, premium olive oil with no additives or preservatives that has a natural lemon flavor. Try this California olive oil on seafood, chicken or fresh steamed vegetables for a mouthwatering taste delight. Also perfect for salads, pasta and bread dipping. Bellissima!

name: Calivirgin Oh! Oregano Olive Oil - 250ML
intro: Calivirgin Oh! Oregano olive oil is milled exactly the same way as our premium extra virgin olive oil, except fresh oregano is crushed together with the olives. The result is a fresh, unfiltered, premium olive oil with no additives or preservatives that has a natural oregano flavor. This olive oil combines well with spicy foods or use it to flavor white fish or meats such as lamb. Buon Appetito!

name: Calivirgin Rustic Rosemary Olive Oil - 250ML
intro: Calivirgin Rustic Rosemary Olive Oil is milled exactly the same way as our premium extra virgin olive oil, except fresh rosemary is crushed together with the olives. The result is a fresh, unfiltered, premium olive oil with no additives or preservatives that has a natural rosemary flavor. Try this California olive oil on chicken, pork, fish, potatoes, salads or bread. Gustoso!

name: Calivinegar Barrel Aged Balsamic Vinegar - 250 ML
intro: Calivinegar Barrel Aged Balsamic Vinegar is a rich and delicious aged balsamic from Modena, Italy with a perfect balance between acidity and sweetness with a thick, velvety texture.

name: Calivinegar Citrus Burst Barrel Aged Balsamic Vinegar - 250 ML
intro: Our barrel aged balsamic vinegar of Modena, Italy has been blended with sweet oranges, tangerines, and a splash of lime to create this inspirational and versatile vinegar. It's fresh, subtle and tangy character will enhance your favorite baby greens salad when whisked with Calivirgin olive oils, or spark up your summer grilled vegetables. Mix half balsamic vinegar with half white wine and brush on chicken or fish as a marinade.

name: Calivinegar Sinful Strawberry Barrel Aged Balsamic Vinegar - 250 ML
intro: Our barrel aged balsamic vinegar of Modena, Italy has been blended with sweet strawberry puree to create a rich and versatile balsamic vinegar. Its sweet yet subtle character creates a simple, refreshing condiment. Combine this balsamic vinegar with Calivirgin olive oil to enhance your favorite salad or simply drizzle over red juicy strawberries to garnish ice cream!

name: Calivinegar Very Berry Ginger Barrel Aged Balsamic Vinegar - 250 ML
intro: Our barrel aged balsamic vinegar of Modena, Italy has been blended with sweet Marion blackberries & ginger. Its sweet yet subtle character is rich & versatile. Combine this balsamic vinegar with a drizzle of Calivirgin olive oil to enhance your favorite salad or use as finishing sauce to accompany succulent roasted pork or poultry. Need a simple, refreshing dessert? Gently combine balsamic vinegar with ripe, juicy fresh fruit!

name: CaliGourmet Olive Oil Dipping Spices
intro: This coarse blend of basil, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, parsley & oregano is the perfect addition to all Calivirgin products. Delicious for bread dipping, as a seasoning for grilled meats or a topping for your baked potato! (4oz Jar)

name: Pinzimonio Olive Oil Dipping Dish - 5"
intro: Inspired by the olive groves of Italy where the artist spends her time, our Pinzimonio Olive Oil Dipping Dish in the leaf design is the perfect compliment to any Calivirgin product! Available for a Limited Time Only!

name: Cosmo Cocktail Shaker Mix
intro: To hip to twist? Try shaking it instead. Sweet and sassy, this is one cocktail that arrives in style, no matter how hard you shake it. Use our Cosmo Cocktail Shaker Mix as a refill for our reusable Cocktail Rx shaker or as a welcome addition to your own cocktail shaker. Combine mix, vodka, water and ice, shake and let the party begin. Each Cocktail Rx Cosmo Cocktail Shaker Mix makes three full shaker rounds (12 cocktails).

name: Cosmo Shaker
intro: To hip to twist? Try shaking it instead. Sweet and sassy, this is one cocktail that arrives in style, no matter how hard you shake it. Just add vodka, water and ice and let the party begin. Each Cocktail Rx Cosmo shaker includes a fun and easy to use reusable shaker, cocktail flavor for two full shaker rounds (8 cocktails) and rimming sugar. Shakers are dishwasher safe and fully recyclable.

intro: Deck the Halls with Mar-Gar-Itas. Grab your friends and favorite Tequila, this sinful treat is perfect when decorating the house or hanging the mistletoe! Just add tequila, ice, water and shake. Each Cocktail Rx Cranberry Margarita shaker includes a fun and easy to use reusable shaker, cocktail flavor for two full shaker rounds (8 cocktails) and rimming sugar.

intro: Her royal highness of Mexican misbehavin' is ready to shake to the Samba and party till the maÃ?Â±ana. Add tequila, ice and water and shake along with her. Each Cocktail Rx Margarita shaker includes a fun and easy to use reusable shaker, cocktail flavor for two full shaker rounds (8 cocktails) and rimming salt.

name: Peppermint Martini Shaker
intro: Make your list and check it twice â?? this is for those who have been Naughty or Nice. Just add vodka, water and a bit of ice, shake to a jingle and enjoy your holiday spice! Each Cocktail Rx Peppermint Martini shaker includes a fun and easy to use reusable shaker, cocktail flavor for two full shaker rounds (8 cocktails) and rimming sugar. Shakers are dishwasher safe and fully recyclable.

name: Pomegranate Martini Shaker
intro: Ring in the new year with holiday cheer! Grab a Pomegranate Martini and sip the holiday season in style! Just add vodka, water and ice and prepare to enjoy all night! Each Cocktail Rx Pomegranate Martini shaker includes a fun and easy-to-use reusable shaker, cocktail flavor for two full shaker rounds (8 cocktails) and rimming sugar.

name: Appletini Cocktail Shaker Mix
intro: Smooth like old school, tart like new school. Shake this bottle and class is in session! Just add vodka, ice and water and shake it till the bell rings! Use our Appletini Cocktail Shaker Mix as a refill for our reusable Cocktail Rx shaker or as a welcome addition to your own cocktail shaker. Combine mix, vodka, water and ice, shake and let the party begin. Each Cocktail Rx Appletini Cocktail Shaker Mix makes three full shaker rounds (12 cocktails).

name: Lemon Drop Cocktail Shaker Mix
intro: Pucker while you shake. Shake this bottle, let your taste buds rattle and rollâ?¦then let the tartness take control. Use our Lemon Drop Cocktail Shaker Mix as a refill for our reusable Cocktail Rx shaker or as a welcome addition to your own cocktail shaker. Combine mix, vodka, water and ice, shake and let the party begin. Each Cocktail Rx Lemon Drop Cocktail Shaker Mix makes three full shaker rounds (12 cocktails).

name: Wickles Pickles
intro: Wickles (short for “Wickedly delicious pickles!”) are a unique blend of dill, garlic, and sweetness with just enough spice to keep you reaching for more. Wickles Pickles are the most exciting new pickle product in years. We hope you enjoy them as much as we do!

name: Wicked Pepper Rings
intro: Anything but your ordinary banana pepper ring, these wicked little sweet slices will make any dish sing. Like Greek salads, pizza pies and sandwiches piled high. It’s a sweet kind of heat, and a taste you can’t deny.

name: Wickles Relish
intro: Wickles Relish has the same flavor as our Wickles Pickles and is that missing condiment in your tuna, chicken, and potato salad. Try it once and you will eat it on everything from hotdogs to black-eyed peas.

name: Hoagie and Sub Relish
intro: We’re pleased to present Wickles Hoagie and Sub Sandwich Relish! Spread this wickedly delicious relish on everything from cream cheese, submarine sandwiches, or black eyed peas. You can mix this spicy thrill with any two-bit meal. From reubens, quesadillas, to that classic ham and cheese, you’d best break it out with those ol’ meat & threes!

name: Wicked Okra
intro: A southern tradition with a spicy, Wickles twist; A delightful rendition that’s not to be missed. When your okra gets wicked, your gumbo’s “c’est bon,” And your bloody mary’s worth serving all day long.

name: Wicked Garden Mix
intro: In salads, On Veggies, whatever you fix, your dish comes alive with our Wicked Mix! Pickles, cocktail onions, and cauliflower all in one jar!

name: Wickles Gift Box
intro: Perfect for any occasion, surprise someone you know with a variety of wickedly delicious products. The gift pack includes Wickles Pickles(2), Hoagie Relish(1), and Wickles Relish(1).

name: Italian Olive Salad
intro: An integral part of New Orleans' world famous cuisine, this mixture of green and black olives, capers, giardiniera (pickled vegetables) and a blend of herbs and spices, is packaged in imported Boscoli Family Olive Oil and canola oil. Traditionally served on a New Orleans "Muffuletta" sandwich, it can also be used in salads, pastas, panini or as a pizza topping. - See more at: http://boscoli.com/node/8#sthash.6b8nkc7m.dpuf

name: Jalapeño Olive Salad
intro: An integral part of New Orleans' world famous cuisine, this mixture of jalapenos, green and black olives, capers, giardiniera (pickled vegetables) and a blend of herbs and spices, is packaged in imported Boscoli Family Olive Oil and canola oil. Traditionally served on a New Orleans "Muffuletta" sandwich, it can also be used in salads, pastas, panini or used as a pizza topping. - See more at: http://boscoli.com/node/37#sthash.s4qH52cE.dpuf

name: Kalamata Olive Salad
intro: An integral part of New Orleans' world famous cuisine, this mixture of kalamata, green, and black olives, capers, giardiniera (pickled vegetables) and a blend of herbs and spices, is packaged in imported Boscoli Family Olive Oil and canola oil. Traditionally served on a New Orleans "Muffuletta" sandwich, it can also be used in salads, pastas, panini or used as a pizza topping. - See more at: http://boscoli.com/node/38#sthash.ZeujQfe8.dpuf

name: Garlic Stuffed Olives
intro: Boscoli Family garlic combined with large tender green olives will make your mouth water.

name: Jalapeño Stuffed Olives
intro: Boscoli Family jalapeno peppers combined with large, tender green olives will tempt your taste buds with just the right amount of heat.

name: Martini Stuffed Olives
intro: Boscoli Family large and tender green olives stuffed with pimento, flavored in vermouth, is the perfect compliment for your next martini.

name: Onion Stuffed Olives
intro: Boscoli Family onions combined with large tender green olives. Just the right amount of zing.

name: Spicy Pickled Beans
intro: Boscoli Family finest quality green beans, packaged with a blend of Creole spices made famous in New Orleans.

name: Spicy Pickled Asparagus
intro: Boscoli Family crisp, young and delicious asparagus spears seasoned with Creole herbs and spices serves as a delicious appetizer or addition to salads and pastas.

name: Dirty Martini Olive Juice
intro: Boscoli Family highest quality juice of tender, delicious green olives will meet your cooking needs and is the perfect ingredient in your next martini.

name: Sun Dried Tomatoes
intro: Boscoli Family ripe tomatoes, baked to perfection in the sun, marinated in 100% olive oil and spices delight the senses.

name: Capers
intro: Boscoli Family Capote Capers are grown in the Mediterranean area and packaged in brine.

name: Spicy Pickled Garlic
intro: Boscoli Family choice pickled garlic cloves marinated in a special blend of New Orleans spices.

name: Creole Pickled Onions
intro: Boscoli Family creole kosher spicy pickled onions. Great in a Dirty Martini .

name: Giardiniera
intro: Boscoli Family mix of pickled vegetables. Crisp cauliflower, carrots, red pepper and celery.

name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil
intro: We permit only a limited number of Extra Virgin Olive Oils to bear our Boscoli Family name. Our olives are grown and cold pressed to produce the fine quality that you expect in Creole/Italian gourmet products.

name: SPICY PECAN VINEGAR
intro: The rich nuttiness of our Spicy Pecan vinegar adds an unexpected depth to just about any dish. Use it as a dressing for a salad of bitter greens and fresh herbs or mixed into pasta, wild rice or barley for a surprising twist. Big enough to stand up to the hardiest of flavors, try marinating your favorite meats before grilling and roasting or drizzle over seafood before serving.
ingredients: Red wine vinegar, white grape juice, cider vinegar, natural and artificial pecan flavoring. Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: BARREL AGED BALSAMIC VINEGAR
intro: Our Barrel Aged Balsamic Vinegar is certified 4 Leaf Quality and imported from the finest regions in Modena, Italy. Upon arriving at our facility we store the Vinegar is Oak Barrels to preserve the fine taste and texture.Try this vinegar as a reduction over lamb or drizzled over fresh strawberries.
ingredients: Balsamic Vinegar of Modena

name: BLACK FIG VINEGAR
intro: The luxurious warmth of the Mediterranean in a bottle. Cuisine Perel’s Black Fig vinegar is the perfect compliment to almost any dish. Just a splash will heighten the flavor of any soup, stew or braised meat. Create the ultimate condiment by roasting fresh figs and serve warm over lamb, pork or vanilla ice cream. An excellent base for a marinade or vinaigrette; try it alone or mix with our walnut grapeseed oil for an easy way to dress salads and grilled vegetables.
ingredients: Fig juice, red wine vinegar, red grape juice, cider vinegar and natural fig flavoring.Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: PINK GUAVA VINEGAR
intro: Straight from the tropics our Pink Guava Vinegar packs a powerful punch that will add a tropical touch to any meal. Its sweet and tangy flavor is great over salads, seafood or with chicken. This surprisingly versatile vinegar will liven up any dish.
ingredients: White Wine Vinegar, Pink Guava Concentrate, White Grape Juice, and Filtered Water.

name: TOASTED PUMPKIN GRAPESEED OIL
intro: Autumn in a bottle, our Toasted Pumpkin grapeseed oil brings the taste of the harvest into your kitchen year round. Use it for roasting and stir-frying root vegetables, with a butternut squash risotto or simply drizzled over pasta for an instant gourmet meal. Its nutty flavor makes it the perfect base for a vinaigrette; try it with salad of baby spinach, pears, walnuts and blue cheese. Get adventurous and use it to sear duck breasts or simply try it instead of olive oil for dipping rustic breads and rolls.
ingredients: Grapeseed oil infused with natural and artificial pumpkin flavoring and paprika.

name: ROASTED CHESTNUT GRAPESEED OIL
intro: Our Roasted Chestnut Oil is rich and nutty with natural flavors. Use in soups, salads or to enhance vegetable dishes. Substitute for other oils when preparing recipes for baked goods
ingredients: Pure grapeseed oil infused with roasted chestnut.

name: POMEGRANATE BALSAMIC VINEGAR
intro: Indigenous to the warm climates of the Mediterranean and Middle East, the intense sweet-tart flavor of the pomegranate is a perfect match of hearty meats. Use alone or whisked together with your favorite oil over a mixed green salad with pomegranate seeds, toasted nuts and feta cheese - adds depth to any of your favorite pan sauces, braised meats or compotes. Add a splash to hearty winter borscht or over sautéed greens (spinach or chard). Drizzle over poached fruit and ice cream for an elegant yet easy to prepare dessert.
ingredients: Balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, pomegranate concentrate, white grape juice, cider vinegar, and natural flavorings.Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL
intro: Our Extra Virgin Olive Oil is a must have in every kitchen. The rich and fruity flavor makes it great for drizzling over pasta or grilled vegetables. Try pairing with one of our vinegars for a spectacular vinaigrette.
ingredients: Extra Virgin Olive Oil

name: BASIL & GARLIC GRAPESEED OIL
intro: The classic flavors of the Mediterranean, basil and garlic grapeseed oil, adds a sense of authenticity to any pasta, risotto or pizza dish. Mix it with tomatoes for a quick and flavorful pasta sauce, brush it on fish and vegetables before grilling or add it to polenta before serving with lamb or beef. Use it with potatoes, mashed or roasted, or as the base for vinaigrette. Delicious and aromatic by itself, basil and garlic grapeseed oil makes another great dipping sauce. What can we say about bruschetta, but yum and make a double batch!
ingredients: Grapeseed oil infused with natural basil and garlic flavoring

name: LEMON ZEST GRAPESEED OIL
intro: Light and crisp, our Lemon Zest grapeseed oil is as versatile as lemons themselves. Use as the base for dressings or marinades or to pan fry snapper, trout or halibut. Brush onto shrimp or scallops before grilling or on chicken with freshly cracked pepper before roasting. A drizzle will add a delicious twist to your favorite pasta, risotto and vegetable dishes; try using it to sauté summer squash or fresh peppers. Like all of Cuisine Perel’s oils, lemon zest also makes a great dipping sauce for warm breads and rolls.
ingredients: Grapeseed oil infused with natural lemon flavoring

name: LATE HARVEST RIESLING VINEGAR
intro: The sweet boldness of grapes makes Cuisine Perel’s Late Harvest Riesling vinegar a prominent statement in any meal. Sweet enough to stand alone, as a dressing with a salad of mixed greens and crumbled blue cheese or simply splash it over fresh summer fruit. For an unexpected brightness, add a little to soups or pasta sauces, or use it as a marinade for seafood or pair it with flavored oil for dipping rustic country breads.
ingredients: White wine vinegar, white grape juice and cider vinegar. Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: BLOOD ORANGE VINEGAR
intro: As versatile as the orange itself, our Blood Orange vinegar intensifies any dressing, marinade or sauce. Try it on a warm spinach salad topped with candied pecans or splash on grilled chicken and fish before serving. Use it when braising or roasting pork or duck or as a fruity marinade for snapper, salmon and halibut. Add a little extra flavor to nutty grains like wild rice or barley, or pour over fresh fruit.
ingredients: Orange juice, white wine vinegar, white grape juice, cider vinegar, natural orange extract and annatto.Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: PURE GRAPESEED OIL
intro: Why grapeseed oil? With the lowest levels of saturated fats of any oil on the market and no trans fatty acids, it is not only good for you but, because of its high flashpoint (419°f), it is the cleanest tasting oil. Grapeseed oil allows for high cooking temperatures without damaging the natural flavors of the food. We use only the highest quality imported European grapeseed oil - no preservatives, no sodium and no cholesterol. Use it as you would olive oil: for pan frying, searing meats and fish, roasting your favorite vegetables or in baking. Yes, baking!
ingredients: 100% pure grapeseed oil

name: WHITE TRUFFLE OLIVE OIL
intro: From the forest, Cuisine Perel’s truffle oils are the ultimate finishing oils. A few drops go a long way toward enhancing any dish. Pair it with shaved parmesan to turn any risotto or pasta into a quick gourmet meal or simply drizzle it over antipasto for the ultimate appetizer. Use it with eggs to turn breakfast into a special brunch. While both types of truffles are unmistakably intense, black truffles impart a more rustic and earthier flavor than their white counterparts, which are lighter and more delicate. Try our grapeseed truffle oils if you are looking for the undiluted flavor of truffles or if you plan to use it as cooking oil. Use our olive oil truffle oils if you enjoy the added dimension of extra virgin olive oil. Cuisine Perel uses only the best; our truffle, olive and grapeseed oils are all imported from top European producers.
ingredients: Extra virgin olive oil and white truffle oil

name: KEY LIME VINEGAR
intro: Surprisingly refreshing, the Key Lime vinegar adds a taste of the tropics. Mix it with fresh pineapple or mango and serve with grilled seafood or pork. Use it to lighten any marinade or vinaigrette or as a finishing sauce over ice creams, sorbets or fruit tarts.
ingredients: White wine vinegar, white grape juice, cider vinegar, natural lime flavoring and natural lemon juice.Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: MANGOSTEEN FRUIT VINEGAR
intro: Mangosteen is a tropical fruit from Southeast Asia that has a silky, citrus and peach sweet flavor. It is also rich in antioxidants. Try over  favorite salad for an added flavor boost.
ingredients: Mangosteen puree, white wine vinegar, white grape juice, cider vinegar and natural mangosteen flavoring. Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: TEQUILA LIME VINEGAR
intro: The punch of tequila without the pain, Cuisine Perel’s Tequila Lime vinegar brings the flavors of the southwest into your kitchen. Use it splashed over tropical fruit mixed into salsa and guacamole or even drizzled into ice tea. The perfect match for the barbecue, use it as a marinade for shrimp or skirt steak before grilling or splash over grilled corn before dusting with salt. Try it as a light dressing with summer salads or even mixed with chocolate sauce before topping your favorite dessert.
ingredients: White wine vinegar, white grape juice, cider vinegar, natural lime and tequila lime flavoring, and natural lemon juice. Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: D'ANJOU PEAR VINEGAR
intro: The natural sweetness of the D’Anjou Pear vinegar makes it the right choice to add for bold and flavorful foods. Add it to caramelized onions and fennel or use it to enrich an autumnal apple or pear chutney. It is perfect as a dressing with seasonal fruits and vegetables, splashed into soups or added to your favorite pan sauces. Get adventurous and try mixing a dash with caramel or chocolate sauce before sprinkling on berries and ice cream.
ingredients: Pear juice, white wine vinegar, white grape juice, vanilla extract, cider vinegar and natural pear flavoring. Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: WILD BLUEBERRY BALSAMIC VINEGAR
intro: Made with a high level of real fruit juice our Wild Blueberry Balsamic Vinegar is bursting with flavor and natural sweetness. Use this product on your favorite green salad, mixed fruit salads or prepare as a reduction sauce and top over blueberries and pancakes.
ingredients: Balsamic vinegar, wild blueberry juice, red grape juice and natural flavoring.

name: CRANBERRY VINEGAR
intro: Serve alone over a salad of mixed greens, dried cranberries and blue cheese or mix with your favorite oil and toss with a salad of roasted beets or other root vegetables. Use it to marinade red meats and pork. Include in any pan sauces or your traditional cranberry sauce for an added dimension. Add to sautéed apples and pears before serving over meats or mix with any braised meats or soups. Mix into couscous with dried fruit and serve as a side dish.
ingredients: Red wine vinegar, cranberry puree, cider vinegar and natural flavorings. Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

Add a splash to hearty winter borscht or over sautéed greens (spinach or chard). Drizzle over poached fruit and ice cream for an elegant yet easy to prepare dessert.
ingredients: Balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, pomegranate concentrate, white grape juice, cider vinegar, and natural flavorings. Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: ACAI BERRY VINEGAR

The Acai is considered to be the most nutrient filled fruit on the earth. One of the leading health benefits of the berry is it promotes a healthy immune system by being so rich in Antioxidants. They are also high in fatty acids that aid heart health, high in fiber that aid in digestion, and high in amino acids to help relax muscles for a more peaceful sleep. Did we mention it’s also DELICIOUS? Enjoy this all natural fruit vinegar on a healthy mixed green salad or on fresh fruit and experience overall better health!
ingredients: Red wine vinegar, Acai berry juice, red grape juice and natural flavors. Naturally occurring sulfites from grapes.

name: Citriburst Finger Limes
intro: Citriburst Finger Limes are a micro-citrus originally discovered growing wild in Australia.  The interior pulp can best be described as citrus pearls, or citrus caviar.  The citrus pearls can be squeezed out of the finger lime and used in any place that you would use a lemon or lime. It goes exceptionally well on seafood and various desserts. The flavor is similar to that of a lemon-lime-grapefruit combo, the juice bursts from the citrus pearls when bitten into.

name: KRAVE BLACK CHERRY BARBECUE PORK JERKY
intro: As KRAVE's newest jerky flavor, our black cherry barbecue pork offers up a finger-licking good taste from the heart of the wine country! We infuse tender slices of pork with our sweet and peppery, Sonoma-style, black cherry barbecue sauce. The result is a deliciously addicting jerky that will leave you KRAVE-ing more!
ingredients: Pork, evaporated cane syrup, water, tomato paste, honey, cherries, sea salt, red wine vinegar, natural black cherry syrup, molasses, spices (paprika, garlic powder, onion powder), citric acid, celery juice powder

name: KRAVE BASIL CITRUS TURKEY JERKY
intro: We infuse succulent turkey breasts with tangy citrus to create a jerky that’s soft, subtly seasoned and bursting with flavor. You’ll taste the rich basil complemented by the clean and crisp citrus notes on the palate.
ingredients: Turkey breast, evaporated cane syrup, water, apple juice, lemon juice, sea salt, honey, spices, lemon pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, celery juice powder.

name: KRAVE LEMON GARLIC TURKEY JERKY
intro: Our lemon garlic turkey jerky offers up an intriguing new taste for jerky lovers – this flavor is made with thinly sliced, juicy turkey breasts and marinated with a balanced combination of garlic, lemon and lemon pepper. This creates a jerky that explodes first with bold garlic, immediately followed by a lemon twist and a peppery finish.
ingredients: Turkey breast, evaporated cane syrup, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol), lemon juice, garlic, black pepper, celery juice powder.  Allergen: soy

name: KRAVE SWEET CHIPOTLE BEEF JERKY
intro: Made from authentic Mexican chipotle, this jerky brings together natural smokiness, a sensation of moderate heat, and a hint of honey to create the perfect balance of sweet and smoky. Tender slices of domestic beef are double marinated and then baked, resulting in an extraordinarily moist, soft and chewable jerky. Olé!
ingredients: Beef, evaporated cane syrup, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol), water, honey, spices (including paprika), vinegar powder, sea salt, citric acid, celery juice powder. Allergen: soy

name: KRAVE CHILI LIME BEEF JERKY
intro: Tease your taste buds with tender slices of knuckle-cut domestic beef teamed with medium-hot chili and finally balanced with zesty lime. This marvelously moist jerky is easy to tear and share, and its unique profile provides a dose of medium heat that partners well with the acidity of the citrus.
ingredients: Beef, evaporated cane syrup, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol), garlic chili sauce (chili, garlic, vinegar, sugar, salt), spices (including paprika), lemon juice, lime juice powder, garlic powder, onion powder, sea salt, celery juice powder.  Allergen: soy

name: KRAVE GRILLED SWEET TERIYAKI PORK
intro: Tender pork slices are soaked in a smoky teriyaki soy marinade, creating a moist and flavorful jerky with a touch of sweetness complementing the natural savory profile of pork without the excess salt.
ingredients: Pork, evaporated cane syrup, water, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol), soybean oil, rice wine, spices, celery juice powder. Allergen: soy

name: KRAVE GARLIC CHILI PEPPER BEEF JERKY
intro: Our garlic chili pepper beef jerky is for those who savor spicy flavor. A robust garlic and chili marinade soaks each tender slice of top round sirloin domestic beef, and is finished with real chili flakes to pack an extra punch. The result is a moist, tasty jerky that teases your taste buds with flavors of garlic, light salt, medium soy sauce and a crescendo of spices.
ingredients: Beef, evaporated cane syrup, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol), garlic chili sauce (chili, garlic, vinegar, sugar, salt), spices, garlic powder, sea salt, celery juice powder. Allergen: soy

name: KRAVE PINEAPPLE ORANGE BEEF JERKY
intro: Say aloha to our pineapple orange beef jerky, a Hawaiian-inspired offering of tender top round sirloin domestic beef marinated in a blend of sweet orange, pineapple and tropical fruit. Slices are carefully baked to preserve their unique flavor of sweetness and acidity, making an exceptionally moist and addictive combination.
ingredients: Beef, evaporated cane syrup, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol) water, molasses, mirin, soybean oil, pineapple juice, orange juice, spices, sea salt, pineapple juice powder, orange juice powder, celery juice powder. Allergen: soy

name: KRAVE CHARDONNAY THYME TURKEY JERKY

ingredients: Turkey, Chardonnay Wine, Brown Sugar. Contains 2% or Less of the Following: Sea Salt, Spices, Granulated Garlic, Onion Powder, Vinegar Powder. Made in facility that processes soy.

name: Cougar Gold White Sharp Cheddar
intro: Our most famous & popular cheese! Winner of several national and international awards. A rich, white cheddar with a smooth, firm texture. This unique cheddar has a depth and intensity that most people have never before experienced. Its creamy, lingering flavor will leave you wanting for more! Our current stock of Cougar Gold is just over one year in age. Buy 2 and store one for aging, as it becomes more sharp and crumbly with age, developing crystals throughout, which can give it kind of a crunch. Comes in our famous 30 oz can.
ingredients: cheddar cheese

name: Alexandria Nicole 2012 Shepherd's Mark
intro: In the early 1900’s, pioneering sheepherders left their mark on the Horse Heaven Hills in the form of Rock Monuments.  These monuments, some still standing along the ridge line of our Destiny Ridge Estate Vineyard were used for marker identification, recreational pastime, artistic expression, and even as simply as to leave ones mark on the world.  We dedicate this Rhone style blend to all the pioneers of the Horse Heaven Hills and continue our efforts to leave our mark on the world through the artistic expression of our wines.  This unique and flavorful white wine boasts floral notes of lavender, layered with pineapple, bosc pear, lemon zest, all leading into a delicious mix of citrus and white peach, and a viscous yet crisp mouth-feel that lingers to a refreshing finish.
ingredients: 65% Roussanne, 20% Marsanne, 15% Viognier, pH: 3.68, TA: 0.63 g/L, Alcohol %: 13.5

name: Aneto Organic Chicken Broth
intro: We choose the freshest vegetables and the best chicken from organic breeders, we carefully wash all the ingredients and we immerse them in cold water before simmering them over a low heat for over 3 hours and then packaging them. Because there is only one way to make NATURAL broth: the way Aneto does it, the way you do at home.
ingredients: Water,Free-range chicken (22%),Onion,Carrot,Cabbage,Leek,Celery,Sea salt

name: Aneto Christmas Broth
intro: We select 100% natural and fresh top-quality ingredients. We simmer them over a low heat for 3 hours, just like always. The secret of this broth is that we have finely mashed the meat, the chickpeas and the vegetables before adding them. This creates a solid layer that will dissolve when the stock is heated, just like when you do it at home.

name: Fermin Ibérico Chorizo Presliced
intro: This dry-cured sausage is made with Ibérico meat and in the traditional Spanish with pimenton and garlic.  This gives the chorizo an exquisite aroma, low acidity and intense flavor.

name: Fermin Ibérico Chorizo Whole
intro: This dry-cured sausage is made with Ibérico meat and in the traditional Spanish way with pimenton and garlic.  This gives the chorizo an exquisite aroma, low acidity and intense flavor.

name: Fermin Ibérico de Bellota Jamon, BONELESS
intro: In the dehesas, an indigenous forest of southwestern Spain, the Ibérico pig, a descendent of the wild boar, still wanders free. Popularly known as the Pata Negra or Black Hoof, the Ibérico de Bellota feed exclusively on fallen acorns, known as bellota, for three months prior to slaughter. The resulting meat is swirled with high levels of flavorful natural fats, for which this pig has gained international notoriety. Fermin brings the finest Spanish delicacy to the U.S.  The whole boneless jamon weighs approximately 9 LBS each.

name: Fermin Ibérico Jamon, Bone-In
intro: In the dehesas, an indigenous forest of southwestern Spain, the Ibérico pig, a descendent of the wild boar, still wanders free.  Popularly known as the Pata Negra or Black Hoof, the Ibérico. Each Jamón Ibérico is cured for a minimum of 2 years in the home of Fermin, La Alberca.  One of the most beautiful mountain villages in the beautiful mountains of Castilla Y Leon, just south of Salamanca. Fermin brings the finest Spanish delicacies to the U.S. A true artisinal Spanish producer.  The whole bone-in ham weighs approximately 16 LBS each.

name: Fermin Jamon Iberico Presliced
intro: Popularly known as Pata Negra or black hoof pig, Fermin Iberico ham is made from the Iberico pig, a special breed native to Spain.  This breed is considered the best for producing high quality dry cured hams with unsurpassed taste and aroma.  Fermin Iberico hams are air-cured for a minimum of 28 months using artisinal methods in the mountains near Salamanca, Spain.

name: Fermin Paleta Serrana Pre-Sliced
intro: Fermin, known throughout the world as one of the highest quality producers of iberico products, brings another high quality item to the USA. The Serrano pig is the white pig that is raised in the beautiful lands surrounding La Alberca, home to Fermin.  The Serrano paleta that this is sliced from is cured for a minimum 18 months using time honored traditional Spanish methods.

name: Fermin Wood Ham Holder (Jamonero)
intro: A stand is necessary for you to hold your Fermin Jamon or Paleta.  Without it, slicing is very difficult.  The wood ham holder is your low cost introduction into the world of jamons and paletas. This works only with bone-in jamons and paletas. This stand will require assembly.  Basic tools only. This stand works best with Fermin products.

name: Fermin Ibérico de Bellota Bone-in Loin Chops
intro: The Chuletero is the Spanish name for the bone-in loin, which consists of the ribs and the loin.  There for, the chuletero can give the chef a cut of meat that is both rich and tender, with consistent properties over a larger yield. The Chuletero is a noble cut in Spain; very juicy and tasteful. Two bone-in loin chops come in a specially designed air tight "skin" package.  Each package averages 6 oz each and contains 2 chops.  These are not boneless chops, there will be feather bones located on the meat opposite the fat side of the chop. Remember where the ibérico de bellota pigs get their flavor, the fat.  Found inside the muscle and on the outside, the fat gets its nutty sweetness from the famous bellota (acorns), only found in Spain.  You will agree that this the finest pork in the world.  We recommend cooking to medium rare, and do not trim more than what has already been done.  The extra fat will infuse the meat with flavor unlike anything you've ever tasted.

name: Fermin Ibérico de Bellota Lomo (Boneless Loin)
intro: The Lomo is composed of the entire loin, without bones. There for, the lomo is both rich and tender, and the leanest cut from the loin with consistent properties over a larger yield. The Ibérico de Bellota Lomo is sold by the whole or half loin.  The whole loin weighs approximately 3.5-4 LBS, and the half loin is approximately 1.75-2 LBS.  This piece has a very thin layer of fat on the outside, so please make sure that you do not cook this more than medium rare.

name: Fermin Ibérico de Bellota Rib Chops
intro: The Chuletero is the Spanish name for the bone-in loin.  There for, the chuletero can give the chef a cut of meat that is both rich and tender, with consistent properties over a larger yield. The Chuletero is a noble cut in Spain; very juicy and tasteful. Two rib chops come in a specially designed air tight "skin" package.  Each package averages 8 oz each and contains 2 chops.

name: Fermin Ibérico de Bellota Costilla (Spareribs)
intro: Located in the thoracic cavity, there are two costillas per pig. The costillas are the same cut as spareribs here in the U.S. Costillas are cut with one uniform section, and two tapered end pieces.  This meat stands out for its intense juiciness and flavour. Costillas contain a high bone to meat ratio; the meat is highly marbled and infused with the acorn rich flavor.  Costillas are sold by the rack, which is cut into three pieces as shown in the picture with white background.  Each rack weighs approximately 5 LBS.

name: Fermin Iberico Sliced Bacon

intro: We start with premium aromatic LAFAZA vanilla that has been sun-cured and dried to remove nearly all of the moisture in the pod. The beans are then ground to a fine powder and sealed for freshness. Pure Ground Vanilla makes a convenient and delicious addition to baked goods, spice rubs, coffee, tea, specialty drinks, smoothies, dry mixes, and can be used in many recipes as a substitute for vanilla beans or vanilla extract.

name: Lafaza 2 WHOLE VANILLA BEANS
intro: LAFAZA  A-1 Grade Premium Madagascar Bourbon vanilla beans represent the finest vanilla produced by farmers each year—the cream of the crop. These 2 whole vanilla beans are fragrant and full of seeds, with deep black coloration and moist, flexible pods. A-1 Grade Premium Madagascar vanilla beans make a wonderful and fresh addition to baking recipes, desserts, savory dishes, and specialty beverages. For most recipes, a single A-1 premium Madagascar vanilla bean is equivalent to 2 tablespoons of Pure Vanilla Extract, or 1 tablespoon of Pure Ground Vanilla.

name: Peanut Butter & Co Smooth Operator
intro: Our great-tasting all-natural peanut butter just got even better! We've reformulated Smooth Operator so that it is now in the No-Stir Natural style. We've added a little bit of palm fruit oil (containing zero cholesterol and zero trans fats) to keep the peanut oil from separating. This means no more stirring the oil back in! Made of peanuts, a little bit of salt, and a little bit of dried cane syrup for sweetness, this delicious no-stir version brings you closer to the peanut butter of your childhood without the high fructose corn syrup and the hydrogenated oil!

name: Peanut Butter & Co Crunch Time
intro: Our great-tasting all-natural peanut butter just got even better! We've reformulated Crunch Time so that it is now in the No-Stir Natural style. We've added a little bit of palm fruit oil (containing zero cholesterol and zero trans fats) to keep the peanut oil from separating. This means no more stirring the oil back in! Made of peanuts blended with great big pieces of chopped peanuts, a little bit of salt, and a little bit of dried cane syrup for sweetness, this delicious no-stir version brings you closer to the peanut butter of your childhood without the high fructose corn syrup and the hydrogenated oil!

name: Peanut Butter & Co Cinnamon Raisin Swirl
intro: Our all-natural peanut butter with cinnamon and raisins. It's like spreading your peanut butter on cinnamon raisin bread—without the bread. It contains no cholesterol, no trans fats, no hydrogenated oils, and no high-fructose corn syrup. It is also gluten-free, certified vegan, and certified kosher pareve by the Orthodox Union. The shelf life is 6 months after opening, if stored in a cool, dry place.

name: Peanut Butter & Co White Chocolate Wonderful
intro: Our all-natural peanut butter blended with sweet white chocolate. More than just a sandwich spread, it is fantastic on fruit, spooned over ice cream, when used as an ingredient in baked goods, or simply eaten out of the jar! It contains no cholesterol, no trans fats, no hydrogenated oils, and no high-fructose corn syrup. It is also gluten-free, certified vegan, and certified kosher pareve by the Orthodox Union. The shelf life is 6 months after opening, if stored in a cool, dry place.

name: Peanut Butter & Co Dark Chocolate Dreams
intro: Our all natural peanut butter blended with rich dark chocolate. It's like a peanut butter cup in a jar! Great on a sandwich, but just as wonderful spooned over ice cream, spread on fruits, or simply eaten out of the jar. It's equally delicious as an ingredient in your all-time favorite baked goodies like chocolate cake and bread pudding. It contains no cholesterol, no trans fats, no hydrogenated oils, and no high-fructose corn syrup. It is also gluten-free, certified vegan, and certified kosher pareve by the Orthodox Union. The shelf life is 6 months after opening, if stored in a cool, dry place.

name: Peanut Butter & Co The Bee's Knees
intro: Our all-natural peanut butter blended with scrumptious honey. The Bee's Knees is a delicious new way to enjoy our peanut butter. You can really taste the honey in this new variety, which promises to become a new classic in sandwiches and snacks across the country. It contains no cholesterol, no trans fats, no hydrogenated oils, and no high-fructose corn syrup. It is also gluten-free, vegetarian, and certified kosher pareve by the Orthodox Union. The shelf life is 6 months after opening, if stored in a cool, dry place.

name: Peanut Butter & Co Mighty Maple
intro: Our all-natural peanut butter blended with yummy maple syrup. People have been telling us that they love to spread peanut butter on pancakes and waffles for years. They love the way the rich and creamy peanut butter blends with sticky, sweet maple syrup to create an unbelievable taste sensation. This new variety of peanut butter is a tasty way to enjoy two great flavors - try it on toast, stirred over oatmeal, or on a sandwich with crispy bacon!

name: Peanut Butter & Co Old Fashioned Smooth
intro: Old Fashioned Smooth is a great tasting, all-natural peanut butter made with our special blend of perfectly roasted peanuts and just a tiny bit of salt. Delicious on its own out of the jar, Old Fashioned Smooth is also a great way to add pure peanutty flavor to your favorite recipe for cookies, smoothies, or scones. Old Fashioned Smooth is a natural peanut butter, which means that we don't add any other oils or sugar to it. If the natural peanut oil starts to separate, just stir it back in. This peanut butter may be a little softer than some other varieties you've tried. The shelf life is 6 months after opening, if stored in a cool, dry place. No need to refrigerate, but it will help keep the oil from separating if you stick it in the fridge after you stir it up.

name: Peanut Butter & Co Old Fashioned Crunchy
intro: Old Fashioned Crunchy is a great tasting, all-natural peanut butter made with our special blend of perfectly roasted peanuts and just a tiny bit of salt. Chock full of chopped peanuts, it's a tasty way to add flavor and texture to celery sticks, oatmeal, toast, ice cream, and more. Old Fashioned Crunchy is a natural peanut butter which means that we don't add any other oils or sugar to it. If the natural peanut oil starts to separate, just stir it back in. This peanut butter may be a little softer than some other varieties you've tried. The shelf life is 6 months after opening, if stored in a cool, dry place. No need to refrigerate, but it will help keep the oil from separating if you stick it in the fridge after you stir it up.

name: Peanut Butter & Co Seriously Strawberry Jam
intro: Nothing takes us back to our childhood like a good ol' PB&J! Next time you're in the mood for America's favorite sandwich, try it out with our luscious strawberry jam.

name: Peanut Butter & Co Jumbo Salted Peanuts
intro: Friends coming over to watch the game? Need something satisfying to snack on that goes great with whatever you're drinking. Try our Jumbo Salted Peanuts - they're the perfect accompaniment at these parties, and at poker games, study breaks, and even the fanciest cocktail parties! We start with extra large Virginia peanuts, roast them to perfection, and then sprinkle them with a touch of salt to bring out the full flavor of the peanuts. It's a satisfying, savory snack that's a must-serve at gatherings!

name: Peanut Butter & Co Rip-Roaring Raspberry Preserves
intro: We all loved peanut butter and jelly as kids. Try some Rip-Roaring Raspberry preserves for a grown up twist on America's favorite sandwich.

name: Peanut Butter & Co Honey Roasted Peanuts
intro: Do you want to have your cake and eat it too? Do you crave the savory taste of salted peanuts but yearn for something sweet at the same time? Well listen up, you bon vivant, because our Honey Roasted Peanuts are just the snack you've been looking for. We start with Virginia peanuts, roast them with extra light amber honey, and then sprinkle them with just the right amount of salt. This creates that unique sweet and savory flavor that will entice your taste buds and keep you coming back for more.

name: Peanut Butter & Co Gorgeous Grape Jelly
intro: You may think you've tried grape jelly before. But one taste of our Gorgeous Grape will change your notion of just how good a PB&J can be. Made without corn syrup, this is sure to be the grapiest jelly you've ever had!

name: Peanut Butter & Co Awesome Apricot Preserves
intro: Here's a fresh take on a PB&J. Next time you get a hankering for a taste of childhood, pair your peanut butter (try Crunch Time) with some Awesome Apricot preserves - it's a taste and texture combination you're sure to love!

name: Peanut Butter & Co Jumbo Spicy Peanuts
intro: Are you nuts about spicy food? And are you ready for something hotter than hot? If you're nodding your head in agreement then our Jumbo Spicy Peanuts are for you! Be warned. The peanuts are on fire! We start with extra large Virginia peanuts, then roast and season them by hand with a fiery blend of natural spices. Just a taste and POW - you're hooked!

name: Backyard Bees Raw Honey
intro: Backyard bees honey taste like flowers from your own backyard. Honey color and flavor are determined by the seasons. Our local atisanal honey is treatment free, uncapped by hand and gravity strained. Never heated or filtered. Raw honey has incrediable antiseptic, antioxidant and cleansing properties for our body and health. Eating local honey may help relieve pollen allergy symptoms.

name: Williams-Sonoma Sanding & Decorating Sugars
intro: Add bright sparkle to home-baked treats with our sanding and shimmer sugars. Ideal for decorating one-of-a-kind cookies for dessert platters and gift baskets, they also add a beautiful finishing touch to frosted cupcakes, cakes and petits fours. Sanding Sugars Set: A rainbow of classic colors—Red Delicious, Poppy Orange, Zesty Yellow, Grassy Green, Glacier Blue and Sweet Pink. Assorted set of six.
ingredients: Red Delicious: Sugar, FD&C colors (Red #40, Red #3), carnauba wax, confectioners' glaze. Poppy Orange: Sugar, FD&C colors (yellow #6), carnauba wax, confectioners' glaze. Zesty Yellow: Sugar, carnauba wax, confectioners' glaze, FD&C colors (Yellow #6). Grassy Green: Sugar, carnauba wax, confectioners' glaze, FD&C colors (Blue #1, Yellow #5) Glacier Blue: Sugar, carnauba wax, confectioners' glaze, FD&C colors (Blue #1). Sweet Pink: Sugar, FD&C colors (Red #3), carnauba wax, confectioners' glaze. These products were prepared and packaged using machines that may come in contact with wheat/gluten, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, eggs, milk, soy.

name: Holiday 3-in-1 Surprise Cookie Cutter Set
intro: Bake up holiday magic with our ingenious cookie cutters! Your finished treats will look like the festive cookies everyone knows and loves—but when cookie fans break them open, they'll find sweet surprises inside. Each cutter creates three pieces for building a cookie that's ready to fill with tiny candies, creamy frostings, fruit jams, caramel or fudge sauce—and lots more. Use the cutters to create surprise-filled treats—or make classic cutout or Linzer-style cookies. Just press firmly to cut the edges, then depress the spring to release delicate shapes embossed with fine detail.

name: Bamix Professional Immersion Blender
intro: Bamix worked with professional chefs to design the ultimate immersion blender for the advanced home cook, delivering unsurpassed power, performance and versatility. Its impressive 200-watt motor offers maximum torque, making every blending task faster and more efficient than ever.

name: Microplane Rasp Grater
intro: The Microplane grater originated as an excellent smoothing tool for woodworkers, which proved to be an indispensable grating tool for cooks. This version of the American-made tool quickly zests citrus fruits and grates even the hardest Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.

name: Bart Korma Curry Powder Mild
intro: A special blend of aromatic spices to flavour your mild curries.
ingredients: Coriander, Turmeric, Onion, Garlic, Lemongrass, Galangal, Cumin, Ginger, White Pepper, Cayenne.

name: Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce
intro: our most popular sauce. created from sun ripened chilies into a smooth paste we have captured its flavor in a convenient squeeze bottle that is easy to use.
ingredients: chili peppers, distilled vinegar, garlic, sugar, and salt.

name: Apilco Ramekins, Set of 4
intro: Our classic porcelain ramekins are wonderfully versatile: Use them to bake individual soufflés (the straight sides promote rising) or to create chilled mousses; they're also great for cooking and serving vegetables and other side dishes. Produced by Apilco, France's leading porcelain manufacturer, each restaurant-quality piece is chip resistant as well as oven, microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Nonstick Madeleine Pan
intro: Perfect for turning out feather-light madeleines, these charming French molds beg for other uses as well – why not bake shell-shaped corn cakes, for instance? Whatever you make, you're assured of a successful result.

name: KitchenAid Design Series Stand Mixer
intro: A smaller version of commercial-size models, this versatile stand mixer is designed with enough power and capacity to prepare large batches of cake batter or cookie dough without compromising your kitchen counter space. It's expertly hand assembled in Greenville, Ohio, home of KitchenAid since 1919.

name: Mcvities Hob Nobs Biscuits
intro: Nobbly, oaty biscuits. One nibble and you're nobbled. Imported from England

name: Kitchen Torch
intro: Give classic crème brûlée its signature caramelized topping using our kitchen torch – a compact version of the ones used by pastry chefs. Its adjustable flame also comes in handy for melting grated cheese and browning meringues and the tops of tarts.

name: Honey Dipper
intro: Drizzle honey into tea or onto biscuits or toast with this classic wooden dipper.

name: Florida Crystals Organic Powdered Sugar
intro: Florida Crystals Organic Powdered Sugar is a premium organic, ultra fine, 10-X confectioners sugar made from 100% certified organic sugar cane, product of the U.S.A. and not genetically engineered. It is perfect for making a smooth rich traditional icing or adding a delicate dusting over your favorite baked goods.

name: Florida Crystals Organic Brown Sugar
intro: Florida Crystals Organic Brown Sugar is a bakers natural choice. We start with 100% certified organic sugarcane harvested and milled on the same day. Florida Crystals Organic Brown Sugar and Organic Powdered Sugar are both premium quality organic sugars, great for all your baking needs.

name: Florida Crystals Organic Cane Sugar
intro: Florida Crystals® Organic Cane Sugar is made from the only 100% certified organic sugarcane grown and harvested in the United States.  Florida Crystals pioneered certified organic sugarcane on our Florida Farm. It is produced in accordance with the USDA's National Organic Program.  Our organic sugar delivers a flavor that is earth friendly and uniquely delicious!

name: Florida Crystals Organic Agave Amber
intro: Florida Crystals Organic Agave Amber is a delicious liquid sweetener that has a low glycemic index. It is made from the leaves of the agave plant. Florida Crystals Organic Agave Amber is the ideal replacement for traditional granulated sugar.

name: Florida Crystals Organic Agave Light
intro: Florida Crystals Organic Agave Light is a delicious liquid sweetener that has a low glycemic index. It is made from the leaves of the agave plant. Florida Crystals Organic Agave Amber is the ideal replacement for traditional granulated sugar.

name: Florida Crystals Natural Cane Sugar
intro: Florida Crystals Natural Cane Sugar is harvested and milled the same day, right on our Florida farm. We use a special single crystallization process that preserves the original flavor of sun-sweetened sugarcane without the use of additives, preservatives, or animal by-products. Great for all your baking, cooking, beverages and fruits.

name: Florida Crystals Demerara Cane Sugar
intro: A rich golden color with a hint of molasses is the distinct characteristic of demerara cane sugar. The splendid bold aroma provides a delicious depth of flavor that enhances tea, coffee, hot or cold cereals and fresh fruit. It is the perfect complement to baking, from the main course to simply adding sparkle and crunch for cookies, tarts, cakes and other fabulous desserts.

name: Asiago & Cheddar CheeseCrisps
intro: Help yourself to the ultimate snack cracker and our most popular product! Offered in three, six or twelve 4.5-ounce cartons, these yummy bite-sized square are crafted from multiple layers of 100% real aged Asiago & Cheddar cheeses and fresh sourdough, seasoned with cayenne butter and baked twice for "the perfect crunch!"
ingredients: Enriched flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Cheddar & Asiago Cheeses (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Sugar, Yeast, Salt, Cayenne Pepper, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Smoked Jalapeño CheeseCrisps
intro: Spicy bits of heaven, where the heat sneaks up on you, that’s the best way to describe John Wm. Macy’s Smoked Jalapeño CheeseCrisps. Yet, it’s just the right amount of heat. The jalapeño peppers work so well with the aged cheeses and rich, sweet butter that you have to keep munching until they’re gone! These crisps really brighten up salads and make chili memorable. Of course, they are absolutely perfect with a cool brew and friends. Check out our Recipe Page for suggestions that our customers have sent us. You would be surprised to see how many great ways you can use them for great entrées... assuming there are any left after you open the box!
ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Cheddar & Asiago Cheeses (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Diced Smoked Jalapeño Peppers, Yeast, Sugar, Salt, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Sesame Gruyère CheeseCrisps
intro: John Macy is constantly trying different blends of cheeses and spices in search for the next great taste. It took some time to find this one, but we’re lucky that he did. The Gruyère cheese is a bit more subtle than most and combines beautifully with the sesame seeds. A little amount of grained Dijon mustard is just the right touch for a wonderful and crunchy crisp. These crisps pair well with your favorite wines. We often see these as a base for many appetizers and have collected Canapé Recipes worth trying. The one thing they have in common with all of John’s creations is the deliciousness and uniqueness of his treats.
ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Swiss and Gruyère Cheeses (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Grained Dijon Mustard, Sesame Seeds, Yeast, Salt, Sugar, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Melting Parmesan CheeseSticks
intro: Melting Parmesan CheeseSticks are the latest addition to our CheeseSticks line!  Choose 3, 6 or 12-packs. These wonderful savory twists of layers of fresh sourdough and generous mounds of 100% real Parmesan cheese pair well with any dish.  Of course, they are delicious by themselves and are usually gone while you are waiting to serve the meal.  Our customers often use them as a special ingredient in delicious recipes.  Visit our Recipe Page to see some wonderful dishes.  Don’t forget to try them warmed up (5 to 10 minutes at 250 degrees). That’s a real treat!
ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Parmesan Cheese (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Yeast, Sugar, Salt, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Melting Romano CheeseCrisps
intro: Our Garlic Romano CheeseSticks were so popular that John Macy decided to make a CheeseCrisps version. Good thing he did! With 100% real aged Romano cheese and the perfect balance of crushed garlic, they are deliciously addictive. You'll be glad you brought them home. Better bring two boxes if someone else is home, because they’ll be gone fast!
ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Romano Cheese (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Crushed Garlic, Yeast, Sugar, Salt, Black Pepper, Basil, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Dijon Swiss CheeseSticks
intro: Only John Wm. Macy could bring aged Swiss cheese and grained Dijon mustard together in such a crispy, tasty treat!  Choose 3, 6 or 12-packs. The multiple layers of fresh sourdough, 100% real Swiss cheese and Dijon mustard are perfectly proportioned for great taste and a delightful crunch.   It’s one satisfying bite after another. Terrific with a bold wine or along side soups and salads. Serve them warmed up (5 to 10 minutes at 250 degrees) for a special treat or try them in your favorite dip!
ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Swiss Cheese (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Grained Dijon Mustard, Salt, Yeast, Sugar, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Melting Parmesan CheeseSticks
intro: Melting Parmesan CheeseSticks are the latest addition to our CheeseSticks line!  Choose 3, 6 or 12-packs. These wonderful savory twists of layers of fresh sourdough and generous mounds of 100% real Parmesan cheese pair well with any dish.  Of course, they are delicious by themselves and are usually gone while you are waiting to serve the meal.  Our customers often use them as a special ingredient in delicious recipes.  Visit our Recipe Page to see some wonderful dishes.  Don’t forget to try them warmed up (5 to 10 minutes at 250 degrees). That’s a real treat!
ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Parmesan Cheese (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Yeast, Sugar, Salt, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Garlic Romano CheeseSticks
intro: One bite of our Garlic Romano CheeseSticks and you just might not be able to stop! Choose 3, 6 or 12-packs. Made with 100% real, aged Romano cheese and crushed garlic between alternating layers of fresh sourdough, then hand-twisted and baked twice for "the perfect crunch!"
ingredients: ﻿﻿﻿﻿Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Romano Cheese (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Crushed Garlic, Yeast, Sugar, Salt, Black Pepper, Basil, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Java Cinnamon SweetSticks
intro: ohn Wm. Macy’s Java Cinnamon SweetSticks are exploding with just the right amount of cinnamon, with a sweetness that makes you want more. These dessert twists make your morning coffee that much better and as dippers into ice cream they can’t be beat!  We have a lot of recipes on our Recipe Page that use the Java Cinnamon SweetSticks as a key ingredient to deliver just the right amount of spice.
ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Unsalted Butter, Sugar, Monterey Jack Cheese (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Cinnamon, Yeast, Salt, Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Madagascar Vanilla SweetSticks
intro: These premium Madagascar Vanilla dessert twists are to die for! You just have to taste them to believe it. Choose three, six or twelve (best value) 5-ounce cartons. Crafted from multiple layers of fresh sourdough, sweetened creamery butter, Madagascar bourbon vanilla and shredded Monterey Jack cheese, these "SweetSticks" are hand-twisted and baked twice to "the perfect crunch!"  Madagascar Vanilla SweetSticks make a great complement to almost any dessert and work equally well as a light dessert or a quick "not-too-sweet" snack. Reheat for a few minutes and serve warm from the oven with ice cream for a special treat. Crush or break into pieces for out of this world toppings!
ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Unsalted Butter, Sugar, Monterey Jack Cheese (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla, Yeast, Salt, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Dutch Chocolate SweetSticks
intro: If you thought John Macy only created savory treats, you’ll be quite surprised and delighted!  John Wm. Macy’s Dutch Chocolate SweetSticks are the perfect blend of fresh sourdough, sweet butter, chocolate and sugar.  With only all-natural ingredients, like all of John Macy’s unique snacks, they are great as simple dessert sticks.  Try them in the morning or after dinner with your coffee.  But they are so much more.  Dip into your favorite ice cream and you’ll never use a spoon again! Our customers have created many outstanding desserts and we have put them on our Recipe Page for you to try. However you enjoy them, you’ll agree... they are outstanding!
ingredients: Enriched flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Unsalted Butter, Sugar, Monterey Jack Cheese (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Chocolate Seeds (Sugar, Chocolate Liquor, Cocoa Butter, Anhydrous Dextrose, Soy Lecithin), Cocoa, Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla, Yeast, Salt, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Original Cheddar CheeseSticks
intro: Enjoy the award-winning favorite that launched our business! Made with multiple alternating layers of fresh sourdough and generous mounds of 100% real aged Cheddar & Asiago cheeses, gently seasoned with cayenne butter, then hand-twisted and baked twice for "the perfect crunch!"
ingredients: Enriched flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Cheddar  Asiago Cheeses (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Sugar, Yeast, Salt, Cayenne Pepper, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs) Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Cheddar & Scallion CheeseSticks
intro: Combining the rich taste of Asiago & Cheddar cheeses with the subtlety of chopped scallions just seemed natural.
ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Cheddar & Asiago Cheeses (Milk, Salt, Cheese Cultures, Enzymes), Unsalted Butter, Chopped Scallions, Yeast, Sugar, Salt, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols and/or Natural Herbs). Allergen Statement: Contains wheat and milk.

name: Sweet Baby Ray's BBQ Sauce
intro: SBR Original's mouthwatering blend has captured the minds and taste buds of fans around the world. While we love every member of our family of sauces equally, the sweet, award-winning, taste of SBR Original will always have a special place in our hearts.
ingredients: http://www.sweetbabyrays.com/getattachment/040a2744-da57-4670-ab78-3470489fe641/Original-Barbecue.aspx

name: Williams-Sonoma Chinese Five Spice Powder
intro: A classic Chinese spice blend, this aromatic mixture is traditionally used to season roast pork and duck. Ours combines fragrant star anise with spicy Szechuan peppercorns and the sweetness of cinnamon and cloves. Finely ground fennel seeds balance and unite the flavors.
ingredients: Szechuan pepper, cinnamon, star anise, fennel, cloves.

name: GREEN TEA SEA SALT
intro: Sprinkle on for vibrant color and subtly sweet flavor.Gorgeous color and an initial slight vegetal taste, followed by lingering sweetness defines our Green Tea Sea Salt. Made with the finest stone ground Japanese green tea powder, our Green Tea Sea Salt's delicate flavor lends itself to a broad range of dishes, from edamame, tempura, and sautéed greens to vanilla deserts, ice cream, and pastries. It's brilliant color and delicate aroma make it a beautiful finishing salt: sprinkle on foods just before serving for exquisite flavor and sophisticated color contrast.
ingredients: Sea Salt, Japanese Matcha Powder.

name: TASTE OF CAJUN
intro: Louisiana is now as close as your kitchen. A dynamic blend of spicy, bright, and soulful flavors, the Taste of Cajun brings the taste of the Bayou to your kitchen. Apply spices to give grilled vegetables a burst of flavor, or use for traditional Cajun blackening of shellfish, seafood, meats, and poultry. Mix the Taste of Cajun into ground meats for spicy Cajun burgers or meatballs, or sprinkle on chicken wings or French fries for a zesty kick.
ingredients: Oregano, Thyme, Black Pepper, Ground Celery Seed, Red Pepper, Paprika, Salt, Onion and Garlic.

name: TASTE OF THAILAND
intro: Thailand is now as close as your kitchen. A racy blend of spicy, sweet, and zesty flavors, the Taste of Thailand  brings the flavors of Thailand to your kitchen. Apply the spices liberally to impart a rich Thai flavor to meats, seafood, grains and vegetables, or use as a rub for beautiful color and a subtler flavor. Taste of Thailand is also wonderful as a marinade or sauce: mix a generous helping of the spice into a cup of coconut cream for a distinctly Thai flavor.
ingredients: Ginger, Basil, Red Pepper, Cumin, Cardamom, Black Pepper, Garlic, Sugar, Onion, Red Bell Peppers, Cilantro, Turmeric Extract and Garlic Oil.

name: TASTE OF TUSCANY
intro: Tuscany is now as close as your kitchen. A fragrant blend of rich, sweet, and peppery flavors, the Taste of Tuscany brings the flavors of Italy to your kitchen. Apply the herbs liberally to impart a distinctly Italian flavor to pastas, poultry, cooked vegetables, salads and fish. The Taste of Tuscany's slightly varied consistency and bright aroma make it the perfect final touch for bruschetta and crostini.
ingredients: Basil, Oregano, Red Bell Peppers, Garlic, Green Bell Peppers, Black Pepper, Fennel and Rosemary.

name: RED CAYENNE SALT
intro: Sprinkle on for bold color and fiery flavor. Sharp, spicy taste and vibrant color define our Red Cayenne Salt. Utilize its intense flavor to bring life to guacamole, poultry, pizzas, steaks and sauces, or elevate and beautify margaritas by rimming the glass with our signature salt. Its vibrant color makes our Red Cayenne Salt a beautiful finishing salt: sprinkle on foods just prior to serving for a piquant flavor and stunning color contrast.
ingredients: Salt, Red Pepper, Yeast Extract, Natural Flavors, Extract of Paprika.

name: TASTE OF CYPRUS
intro: Cyprus is now as close as your kitchen. An energetic blend of peppery, sweet, and warm flavors, this authentic spice brings the Taste of Cyprus to your kitchen. A Mediterranean blend traditionally used to season lamb and flavor gyros, this spice adds a savory warmth to vegetable and grain dishes like eggplant, couscous, and lentils. Taste of Cyprus imparts a burst of flavor and beautiful color when sprinkled on Greek yogurt, hummus, or tzatiki.
ingredients: Salt, Paprika, Black Pepper, Garlic, Cumin, Oregano, Red Pepper, Cilantro.

name: ITALIAN BLACK TRUFFLE SEA SALT
intro: Sprinkle on for deep, richly nuanced flavor. The impossibly rich, seductive flavor of black truffles defines our Truffle Sea Salt.  Made from Italian sea salt and a generous heaping of Italian black truffles, this salt elevates simple dishes into gastronomically stunning masterworks. Add distinctive, profoundly decadent flavor to foods ranging from roasted zucchini, grilled meats, and eggs, to popcorn and French fries. Large, plentiful specs of truffle and its deep umami flavor make our Truffle Sea Salt a perfect finishing salt: sprinkle on foods just before serving for a beautiful bouquet and lingering succulent flavor.
ingredients: Sea Salt, Italian Melanosporum Black Truffle.

name: GARLIC PEPPER RUB
intro: Elevate simple dishes to signature favorites. A lively blend of bold, zesty flavors, our authentic Garlic Pepper Rub adds full-bodied flavor to whatever is on the menu. Toss with salads, pasta, rice, and vegetables, or rub on meats, shellfish, poultry, and seafood prior to grilling for a spirited piquant taste. Our Garlic Pepper Rub is also wonderful as a marinade: mix a generous helping into a cup of soy sauce and allow food to marinate for three to four hours.
ingredients: Salt, Garlic, Black Pepper, Red Bell Pepper, Parsley.

name: TASTE OF THE SOUTHWEST
intro: The Southwest is now as close as your kitchen. A full flavored blend of warm piquant flavors, the Taste of the Southwest brings the flavors of the American Southwest to your kitchen. Use as a rub to add rich, smoky flavor to meats, poultry, seafood and shellfish, or sprinkle on roasted vegetables just prior to serving for beautiful color and flavorful heat. Taste of the Southwest is also wonderful as a marinade or sauce: mix a generous helping of the spice into a cup of sour cream for a distinctly Tex-Mex flavor.
ingredients: Paprika, Garlic, Oregano, Black Pepper, Salt, Red Pepper, Coriander, White Pepper, Fenugreek, Fennel, Nutmeg, Cardamom, Cloves, Basil, Rosemary, Celery, Thyme, Marjoram, Ginger, Cumin, Cinnamon and Turmeric.

name: TASTE OF BORDEAUX
intro: Bordeaux is now as close as your kitchen. A savory blend of warm, fresh, and light flavors, the Taste of Bordeaux brings the refined flavors of French wine country to your kitchen. Apply the spices liberally to bring the refined taste of French cuisine to your poultry, salad, seafood, and potato dishes. Taste of Bordeaux elevates egg dishes to something truly special: try on quiches, omelets, and poached or scrambled eggs.
ingredients: Chives, Dill Tips, Basil Leaves, Chervil, Tarragon, White Pepper and Parsley.

name: NATURAL SMOKED SEA SALT
intro: Sprinkle on for toasty color and a rich smoky flavor. Deep Alderwood smoke flavor and a mottled mahogany color define our Natural Smoked Sea Salt. Utilize its remarkably savory flavor on chicken, pork, potatoes, burgers, and add real depth to foods cooked on gas-fired grills.  Its sparkling hazel color makes our Natural Smoked Sea Salt a beautiful finishing salt: sprinkle on foods just before serving for full-bodied flavor and a dappled luster.
ingredients: Natural smoked sea salt.

name: TASTE OF CALIFORNIA
